data.title: Lifepoint Church
data.text:
Large Group Leader

Work with the Loop team and prepare lesson to share with preteens during Loop worship services. Be intentional in relationship with kids and families with a discipleship focus.

Small Group Leader

Prepare and teach breakout lesson with a small group of preteens, creating invested relationships that lead to true discipleship.

Worship Leader

Work with the Loop team to choose meaningful worship songs. Lead students in a genuine worship experience.
